message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SY

The paper discusses the need for a mechanism to detect and identify attackers in autonomous networks, which is a key concern in the field of computer security (cs.CR). The networks in question are collaborative networks of devices, which fall under the category of networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the use of autonomous systems and self-organization, which are topics in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The scalability of the proposed solution is also emphasized, which is a key concern in distributed computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper discusses the use of the proposed scheme in critical infrastructure, which falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY).
